attributes.additional_details: from april 2nd 2013,royal mail increased many of its parcel prices by a huge margin,some of the most common used services by almost 100% ,this comes at a time when internet sales are booming,and  royal mail parcels were already profit making,as a public owned organisation,the decision to do this should be looked at very closely,along with the people who made the decisions,and their obvious disregard of the effects these outrageous price increases will have on small buisnesses and private users
